title: Blended Mentoring Program for Strengthening Medical Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A blended program designed to strengthen leadership competencies for in-service medical professionals in workplace settings, offering leadership training that recreates real patient care environments through VR simulations.

learning_goals: VR simulations recreate conflict scenarios within medical teams, enabling the application of appropriate leadership strategies with 80% accuracy per situation.
Using an e-mentoring platform, learners perform reflective questioning on practical problems at least once monthly and develop improvement plans.
By the end of the 6-month course, participants achieve an average improvement of over 20% in self-assessed leadership behavior changes (e.g., communication, decision-making).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
